local_intent: Align tool to the T-block, set yaw 90°, push it 0.1 m toward 90°, and verify visibility.
assumptions: Goal marker already detected earlier in the global flow
Yaw 90° aligns with intended push direction
coherence_with_global: Matches global steps: detect t_block, approach+align with tolerance 0.01, set yaw 90°, push distance 0.1 at 90°. Adds a minimal post-action check via IsObjectVisible.
